Pastures Past: Boozy 1923 Christmas farm theft involves a pig and four ducks https://www.nzherald.co.nz/the-country/news/pastures-past-boozy-1923-christmas-farm-theft-involves-a-pig-and-four-ducks/RODIKQY7NBGSLGMKBQOJQZOVZQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/the-country/news/pastures-past-boozy-1923-christmas-farm-theft-involves-a-pig-and-four-ducks/RODIKQY7NBGSLGMKBQOJQZOVZQ/ Kem Ormond"On arriving at the courthouse, they actually tried to sell the pig to its real owner." Sat, 21 Dec 2024 16:01:00 +0000 In 1923, Walter James Ross pleaded guilty to having stolen a pig, 10lb. of bacon, four ducks, and 1lb. of butter. Photo / 123RF
Waikato beekeeper shifts focus to kiwifruit pollination amid honey glut https://www.nzherald.co.nz/the-country/news/waikato-beekeeper-shifts-focus-to-kiwifruit-pollination-amid-honey-glut/SLJV7NWILRA5FLGPK6QMOE4GNY/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/the-country/news/waikato-beekeeper-shifts-focus-to-kiwifruit-pollination-amid-honey-glut/SLJV7NWILRA5FLGPK6QMOE4GNY/ Steve Edwards“We had to find a happy balance, or we would’ve been out of business two years ago.” Sat, 21 Dec 2024 16:00:00 +0000 The bulk of beekeeper Matt Crawford's income is generated from pollination. Photo / Duncan Brown

Sat, 21 Dec 2024 16:00:00 +0000 What is the term for a word that sounds like the noise it describes? Photo / File
House-sitter Judith Webby has dog die in her care while owners watch on CCTV from overseas https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/house-sitter-judith-webby-has-dog-die-in-her-care-while-owners-watch-on-cctv-from-overseas/RLPO3ZBKSFGZFIYCIUPDSYE5EU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/house-sitter-judith-webby-has-dog-die-in-her-care-while-owners-watch-on-cctv-from-overseas/RLPO3ZBKSFGZFIYCIUPDSYE5EU/ Jeremy WilkinsonJudith Webby has a long history of upsetting flatmates, and home- and pet-owners. Sat, 21 Dec 2024 16:00:00 +0000 Winston, a bulldog that died shortly after being in the care of Judith Webby (inset), a woman with a chequered history, who also abused Winston's owners.
Editorial: Why the lightning fall of Syria’s brutal regime matters for us all https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/editorial-why-the-lightning-fall-of-syrias-brutal-regime-matters-for-us-all/B5XBWOPIG5EGHA5PGUIJUAFIQ4/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/editorial-why-the-lightning-fall-of-syrias-brutal-regime-matters-for-us-all/B5XBWOPIG5EGHA5PGUIJUAFIQ4/ OPINION: The ripple effects of a post-Bashar al-Assad world could spread to NZ. Sat, 21 Dec 2024 16:00:00 +0000 The end of the regime of Syrian dictator Bashar al-Assad is a chance for the country to rebuild. Photo / AFP
Baradene College of the Sacred Heart principal Sandy Pasley retires from school https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/baradene-college-of-the-sacred-heart-principal-sandy-pasley-retires-from-school/COBS4DG7P5B6VCSJ2G3P5RYYTU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/baradene-college-of-the-sacred-heart-principal-sandy-pasley-retires-from-school/COBS4DG7P5B6VCSJ2G3P5RYYTU/ 'When I started, teacher salaries were near to what backbench MPs were getting.' Sat, 21 Dec 2024 16:00:00 +0000 Baradene College principal Sandy Pasley is retiring after more than 13 years in the role, which included time as the first female president of the Secondary Principals' Association. Photo / Sylvie Whinray
Helena Cribb, sentenced to home detention for drunken hit-and-run death, flaunts ankle bracelet and drink in private social media posts https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/helena-cribb-sentenced-to-home-detention-for-drunken-hit-and-run-death-flaunts-ankle-bracelet-and-drink-in-私人社交媒体帖子/TC6ZI5NRNRCHFJXV36FWI6NBHU/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/helena-cribb-sentenced-to-home-detention-for-drunken-hit-and-run-death-flaunts-ankle-bracelet-and-drink-in-私人社交媒体帖子/TC6ZI5NRNRCHFJXV36FWI6NBHU/ George BlockHelena Cribb told a probation officer she hadn't drunk alcohol in months. Sat, 21 Dec 2024 16:00:00 +0000 Helena Cribb, sentenced to home detention on December 18, 2022 over the hit-and-run death of Jason Collins, displayed her ankle bracelet monitor and a wine glass in two posts to her "close friends" on Instagram, since leaked to the Herald. Cribb told the court she had not drunk for some time before her sentencing. Photo / Supplied
Kiwi teacher working as elf in Lapland Santa Claus village near Arctic Circle https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/kiwi-teacher-working-as-elf-in-lapland-santa-claus-village-near-arctic-circle/FAFC3UJIMVHR3IS4HPLDCLHJSQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/kiwi-teacher-working-as-elf-in-lapland-santa-claus-village-near-arctic-circle/FAFC3UJIMVHR3IS4HPLDCLHJSQ/ Cherie HowieExperiencing phenomena like the Northern Lights makes up for long work hours, Kiwi says. Sat, 21 Dec 2024 16:00:00 +0000 Former Bay of Plenty teacher Virginija Werder has been working as an elf in a Santa Claus village in Rovaniemi, near the Arctic Circle in Lapland, since October.
Spurned lover’s revenge on cheating husband and his wife ends in home detention for false allegations https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/spurned-lovers-revenge-on-cheating-husband-and-his-wife-ends-in-home-detention-for-false-allegations/JAYNHBJX3BFC7AA7TT7WUTC63Q/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/spurned-lovers-revenge-on-cheating-husband-and-his-wife-ends-in-home-detention-for-false-allegations/JAYNHBJX3BFC7AA7TT7WUTC63Q/ David Fisher, George BlockCheater speaks of lover's lies and 'terrifying' time behind bars.Sat, 21 Dec 2024 16:00:00 +0000 Famiza Sahib, also known as Famiza Zayan, was sentenced at the Manukau District Court after an elaborate scheme tricked cops into arresting her former married lover and his wife.
Grieving at Christmas: I mourn for my sister but I’m determined to find joy these holidays – Shane Te Pou https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/grieving-at-christmas-i-mourn-for-my-sister-but-im-dependent-to-find-joy-these-holidays-shane-te- pou/HDSUEORQLNCPRDLGUAOKU3PJWA/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/grieving-at-christmas-i-mourn-for-my-sister-but-im-dependent-to-find-joy-these-holidays-shane-te- pou/HDSUEORQLNCPRDLGUAOKU3PJWA/ Shane Te PouOPINION: I'm left with the weight of her absence and the guilt that comes with smiling. Sat, 21 Dec 2024 16:00:00 +0000 Shane Te Pou with his late sister Marjorie.
